questions.Text: I can see the good in people
I could talk to my colleagues about a personal problem.
If a colleague needed to talk about a personal problem, I would be there to listen.
One of my colleagues has become a true friend.
My manager appreciates me.
My colleagues say "thank you" when I do them a favour..
When I talk about my company I refer to it as a "We" (ex: we did that project).
I know my company's core values.
Results are more important than efforts.
People clean up after themselves in the common areas.
I'm often disturbed by people talking next to my desk while I'm working.
Keeping my workplace clean and tidy is important to me.
I often forget to stay hydrated at work.
I usually ask again when I don't understand the first time.
I would love to spend a working day on volunteering activity.
I would also like to ask questions to my colleagues via the VoxCollector.
My employer stimulates interactions between the different teams.
My manager takes my feedback seriously.
The management is accessible and approachable.
I will smile to the next person I see.
I have a good work/life balance.
I feel optimistic most of the time.
I am proud of what I do here.
